show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's the Legend of the Sun King
other_title: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Taiyōō Densetsu (Japanese)
哆啦A夢：大雄的太陽王傳說 (Chinese (Taiwan))
映画ドラえもん のび太の太陽王伝説 (Japanese)
電影多啦A夢：大雄的太陽王傳說 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: Doraemon and its friends open a hole in the time and they're travel to the Country of Mayana, a lost Mayan civilization in the jungle. There, Nobita will know its perfect double, prince Thio, heir to the throne. Both will decide to interchange papers to try to save to the Country of Mayana of the claws of the infernal Ledina witch and her evil forces.
